caption.title: General perception of being affected by climate change in patients and tourists with allergies.
caption.p: Both groups anticipated to be significantly more affected in the future than at present (Fisher’s Exact test, Patients: p<0.05; Tourists: p<0.001). In the future allergic tourists feel more affected than allergic patients (Fisher’s Exact test, patients p<0.05, tourists p<0.001).
Click here for additional data file.
